Question.Subject: why does chat roulette make my browser crash when i connect my cam?
Question.Content: so chat roulette works fine if i dont have my web cam connected but as soon as i try to use it with my cam my browser crashes. same thing happens with the new omegle video thing havnt tried it with stickam yet..... im using fire fox and i really hate chrome. an also i havnt installed the drivers for the cam... i dont have the disk... didnt know if that might be the problem.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Which browser are you using? = Try another browser - Mozilla Firefox == http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/personal.html - Google Chrome == http://www.google.com/chrome

Answer.Content:
Try a different browser and see if it still happens (I'd recommend Chrome)
If it still happens, it's your webcam that's the problem.
